title: Data Mining Assistant role - Introductory Data Mining online Research Job - $2/hr - 5* Feedback
snippet:
Data Mining Assistant role - Introductory Data Mining online Research Job - $2/hr preferred - 5* Feedback

Data Mining, Junior Level, Trial Job 
Dedication, attention to details and availability to work are the most important qualities I am looking for. 

Bids around $2/hour are preferred. 

This job is for a general data mining assistant job. I have a wide variety of data related tasks that I could use help with. In return, I can offer a modest pay rate, training and a chance to gain ODesk work experience. 

Minimum availability: 5-10 hours per week for 12+ weeks
Please don't apply if you are not able to work at least 5 hours per week

Many VA’s I have hired have gone on to get pay increases, increase in hours and long term contracts (3+ years!)

This job is for applicants who : 
1. want to gain ODesk experience 
2. can work 10+ hours per week as needed for 12 weeks
3. want a chance to prove themselves on ODesk for higher-paying part-time or full-time work in the future with this organization or another one 

Skills/Experience Required: 
1) Excellent Written Native English Skills
2) Familiarity with microsoft office (Word, excell) & Dropbox
3) Availability on Skype preferable
4) Ability to use spread sheet well
5) Familiar with the copy and paste functions :)
